snippet: Benjamin Netanyahu’s decision to support an Israeli Supreme Court order to close an illegal neighborhood is hopeful. But, for the sake of peace, he needs to go a lot further.
abstract: Editorial applauds decision by Israel's Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu to support an Israeli Supreme Court order to close an illegal neighborhood in the West Bank; urges Netanyahu to promptly implement the decision, as well as to declare a cessation in all settlement activity and invite Palestinians for serious peace talks.
lead_paragraph: Benjamin Netanyahu’s decision to support an Israeli Supreme Court order to close an illegal neighborhood is hopeful. But, for the sake of peace, he needs to go a lot further.
